attributes.action: increase retirement pensions paid by the Government to the level enjoyed by residents in Holland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dutch pensioners enjoy higher pensions than the meagre amount 'enjoyed' by British pensioners.  In addition they get a payment of 2 extra week's pension each summer so that they can take a holiday and they get an extra allowance for redecorations or repairs to their house/flat
